title: Step 26

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should create a new 50% selector in your @keyframes cabins rule.
tests.testString:
const rules = new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getCSSRules('keyframes')?.[1]?.cssRules;
assert(rules?.[0]?.keyText === '50%' || rules?.[1]?.keyText === '50%' || rules?.[2]?.keyText === '50%');

tests.text: Your 50% selector should be between your 0% and 100% selectors.
Your 50% selector should have a background-color property set to purple.

description: Between the 0% and 100% selectors, add a 50% selector. This will apply in the middle of the animation cycle. Set the background-color to purple.
